title: Ask how to be added to our Waitlist!
posting_body: ['Columbia Luxar', 'RENT:', '$1381 / MONTH', 'SIZE:', '1451 sq ft', 'BEDROOMS:', '3', 'BATHROOMS:', '2', 'LEASE TERMS:', '12-Month', 'show contact info', 'UNIT FEATURES:', '◾ Air Conditioning', '◾ Balcony/Patio', '◾ Ceiling Fan', '◾ Dishwasher', '◾ Disposal', '◾ Efficient Appliances', '◾ Granite Countertops', '◾ Pre-wired for Security System', '◾ Spacious Interiors', '◾ Walk-In Closets', 'At Peak Living, we are committed to excellent service for our residents.', 'Our community has everything you are looking for in a new apartment home.', 'Our caring, on-site management and maintenance professionals are eager to meet all your needs.', 'Designed to give our residents the best, this is more than a place to call home-it is Apartment Living at its Peak!', 'PROPERTY FEATURES:', '◾ BBQ/Picnic Area', '◾ Business Center', '◾ Laundry Facilities', '◾ On-Site Maintenance', '◾', 'On-Site Management', '◾ Picnic Area', '◾ Play Court', '◾ Playground', '◾ Security System', '◾ Sparkling Pool', '◾ 24 Hour Availability', '◾ Breakfast/Coffee Concierge', '◾ Controlled Access/Gated', '◾ Non-Smoking Community', '◾ Planned Social Activities', '◾ Professionally Designed and Maintained Landscape', '◾ Resident Services Portal with Online Payment & Maintenance Request Options', 'PET POLICY:', 'Do not allow pets.', 'VISIT OR CALL US TODAY!', '3120 Guadalupe Ave', 'Dallas, TX 75233', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '76D155077F7A4B4']
